about_the_game: eBall 2 is a multiplayer arena shooter where players control high-tech balls armed with four different weapons: a rocket launcher, an automatic rifle, a shotgun, and a sniper rifle. The rocket launcher can also be used to perform rocket jumps, adding an extra level of mobility to the game. Players can also use the special ability "hook" to maneuver around the arena and outmaneuver their opponents. By combining the rocket jumps and hook ability, players can pull off incredible stunts and gain an advantage over their opponents. With its dynamic weapons, fast-paced action, and unique gameplay mechanics, eBall 2 is a must-play for shooter fans looking for a fresh and exciting experience.
detailed_description:
WISHLIST OUR NEW GAME


About the Game

eBall 2 is a multiplayer arena shooter where players control high-tech balls armed with four different weapons: a rocket launcher, an automatic rifle, a shotgun, and a sniper rifle. The rocket launcher can also be used to perform rocket jumps, adding an extra level of mobility to the game. Players can also use the special ability "hook" to maneuver around the arena and outmaneuver their opponents. By combining the rocket jumps and hook ability, players can pull off incredible stunts and gain an advantage over their opponents. With its dynamic weapons, fast-paced action, and unique gameplay mechanics, eBall 2 is a must-play for shooter fans looking for a fresh and exciting experience.
name: eBall 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7+
  • Processor: i5 4th gen, fx8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10+
  • Processor: i7 6th gen, ryzen 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: eBall 2 is a multiplayer arena shooter where players control high-tech balls armed with four different weapons: a rocket launcher, an automatic rifle, a shotgun, and a sniper rifle.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese
